thread.title: Granny Deb

author: Granny Deb
title: Granny Deb
text:
I have been a regular customer for several years. I find the app on iPhone and iPad easy to use and regularly upload and order prints. I've also created several photo books as gifts for my grandchildren with equal success.i am currently waiting for invitation cards to arrive which I have ordered, again finding the website easy to use with clear instructions and fast uploading of photos.
I highly recommend snapfish .
